include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (NGHTTP2_ARCHIVE "${NGHTTP2_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/lib/libnghttp2.a")

register_external_lib (libnghttp2 ${NGHTTP2_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${NGHTTP2_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${NGHTTP2_BUILTIN_LOCATION} -D_BUILT_IN_NGHTTP2")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${NGHTTP2_BUILTIN_LOCATION} -D_BUILT_IN_NGHTTP2")
